name: The Bullet Men
description: The Bullet Men have been captured by the Grass Ogres!  I'm a little low on cash so the only ammo you have is . . . the Bullet People. Don't worry though, they don't mind. Defeat the Grass Ogres and use the Money that all ogres are made of to trade with the Old Man in the woods. Upgrade your shooter and survive as long as possible. :)
